title: How can I configure the screen lock feature?
answer:
Swipe left on the watch's home screen, select **Settings**, and then set **Screen lock **to **ON**. Enter your unlock pattern to complete the screen lock settings.
![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/733dc_ukztk.gif) NOTE: 

*   Touch **Lock screen now **to lock your watch's screen.
*   Your watch will vibrate when you receive a notification. If the screen is locked, you must unlock it first using your unlock pattern before you can view the notification.
